scripts.nope__instrument: if [ -d ../app.orig ]; then rm -rf ../app.orig; fi; cp -a ../app ../app.orig && nyc instrument ../app ../app && rm -rf ../app/plugins/modules/composer/\@demos && cp -r ../app.orig/plugins/modules/composer/\@demos ../app/plugins/modules/composer/\@demos && rm -rf ../app/plugins/modules/composer/tests && cp -r ../app.orig/plugins/modules/composer/tests ../app/plugins/modules/composer/tests
scripts.nope_instrument: git diff-index HEAD | grep 'app/' && echo 'uncommitted changes, aborting' || npm run _instrument
scripts.nope_deinstrument: if [ -d ../app.orig ]; then rm -rf ../app.inst && mv ../app ../app.inst && mv ../app.orig ../app; fi
